Headline: On GPS: America reacts to the Coronavirus
Article_Body: Anna Fifield, Beijing Bureau Chief for the Washington Post, Rana Foroohar, CNN Global Economic Analyst and Dr. Colleen Kraft, MD, Associate Chief Medical Officer at Emory University Hospital discuss how the U.S. could handle an outbreak like the Coronavirus. Dr. Kraft tells Fareed that since the virus became a concern in China there's been a ramp-up in preparations in the U.S. unlike any in the past.
